ABOUT COUNTRY THUNDER
​
EMAIL:
info@countrythunder.com
PHONE: 1.866.388.0007
​
Country Thunder is a music festival brand that hosts several concerts in North America each year. They have operated festivals in Wisconsin and Arizona since 1996, and shows in Saskatchewan since 2005 and in Alberta since 2016. In 2019, Country Thunder Florida joined the family!
Past acts include: Garth Brooks, Kenny Rogers, John Denver, Dolly Parton, Willie Nelson, Tim McGraw, Clint Black, Alan Jackson, Brad Paisley, Reba McEntire, George Strait, Taylor Swift and Kenny Chesney plus many many more!
CT ARIZONA EVENT LOCATION: 20585 E. Price Station Rd., Florence, AZ 85132
CT WISCONSIN EVENT LOCATION: 2305 Lance Drive, Twin Lakes, WI 53181
CT ALBERTA EVENT LOCATION: 223 Castleridge Blvd NE, Calgary, AB T3J 3J8
CT SASKATCHEWAN EVENT LOCATION: 50.702220, -104.808011, Craven, SK S0G 0W0
​
COUNTRY THUNDER MAILING ADDRESSES:
​
US MAILING ADDRESS: 730 Gallatin Pike N., Nashville, TN 37115
CANADA MAILING ADDRESS: 1602E McDonald Street Regina, SK S4N 6R5

Questions?
/$
$
We can be reached at
1.866.388.0007
, Monday through Friday, 9am to 5pm Central Time. You may also email us at
info@countrythunder.com
.
/$
/$
$
FOOD & RETAIL VENDORS
/$
$
We are no longer accepting vendor applications for our 2025 US Festivals.
Apply to be a retail vendor at one of our Canadian Festivals
|
Apply to be a food vendor at one of our Canadian Festivals
​
Questions? Please contact
vendors@countrythunder.com
.
​

Interested in becoming a sponsor or partner? Please contact

MEDIA

Interested in covering one of our events? Please fill out our
application here
for our US shows.
If you're interested in covering one of our Canadian festivals, please fill out our application here.
Questions? Please contact
media@countrythunder.com
.

/$
$
$
CANADIAN STREET TEAM
/$
$
Spread the word, get rewarded! We’re looking for passionate fans to come work with us on our street team in exchange for some really cool perks! Interested? Applications are open for Country Thunder Saskatchewan + Country Thunder Alberta.
Saskatchewan Application
|
Alberta Application
/$
/$
$
$
STAFF
/$
$
Interested in working with the Country Thunder team? Select an application below.
US Application
Canadian Application
​
Interested in working as a bartender at one of our US festivals?
Please email
cj@cnceventservices.com
using the subject line "Bartending" and indicate which festival location you are interested in.
*PLEASE NOTE - we are unable to forward any requests to bartend at our Canadian festivals*
/$
/$
$

non-profit DONATION REQUESTS
/$
$
***Please allow 4 to 6 weeks for a response after submission.***
Our 2025 Request Form is now available
here
.
